DIA_DrunkenSailor_DRUNKEN_SAILOR_04_03_0: Don't drink that! Beer is not the drink of a true sailor!
This bottle has sailed the seven seas with me and seen the ends of the world!
This is a drink worthy of a great adventurer!
DIA_DrunkenSailor_AMBIENT_SAILOR_04_03_0: Through the mists I see an island like from a girl's dreams...
